content:
My advisor @Olivia Caramello has kindly asked me to announce her new forum, Around Toposes.
It's designed to be a hub for discussions on toposes and adjacent topics. The format is a little more formal than here, but there is more room for longer form contributions, such as this post I wrote this past week. It is also hoped that it will become a resource for folks learning topos thery for the first time, although some input and learner questions are needed before that!
Wow! Thanks @Olivia Caramello and everyone who made this
This is amazing @[Mod] Morgan Rogers . Thanks a lot for sharing!
